scripts.ci:build-frontend: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:1337 && cd frontend && bun run build
scripts.ci:prep: cd backend && bun run strapi export --no-encrypt --only content,config --file strapi-export-ci
scripts.dev-next: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:1337 && cd frontend && bun run dev
scripts.production:strapi: cd backend && bun run build && bun run start
scripts.production:next: wait-on https://api.ttc-klingenmuenster.de/admin && cd frontend && bun run build && bun run start
